mapper.select: SELECT l_name as lName, l_group as lGroup, l_grade as lGrade, l_num as lNum, l_organ as lOrgan, TO_CHAR(l_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') lDate, member_id as memberId FROM license WHERE member_id= #{memberId}
mapper.sql: l_name as lName, l_group as lGroup, l_grade as lGrade, l_num as lNum, l_organ as lOrgan, TO_CHAR(l_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') as lDate, member_id as memberId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO License( l_name, l_group, l_grade, l_num, l_organ, l_date, member_id )VALUES( #{lName}, #{lGroup}, #{lGrade}, #{lNum}, #{lOrgan}, TO_DATE(#{lDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{memberId} )
